ygData.subject: Re: Blackened Iron Bastard Sowrd
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I have the last time I was there. Are you clearing out the other Dazed goblins? I hear that is supposed to help trigger the knight. The time we camped for
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I have the last time I was there. Are you clearing
out the other Dazed goblins? I hear that is supposed
to help trigger the knight.

The time we camped for him we had 2 Borxx spawns.

I would think about buying one it they weren't going
for 500-600 plat on Povar.

Good luck,

Belgarth

--- Robin McCaig <twister@...> wrote:
> From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>
>
> We camped the BIBS in runnyeye last night for 6
> hours straight and the
> knight never spawned. Anyone else have this problem?
> Twisterkahn
